name: Migrate Colony
body: Move one of your colonies to another site on the same planet.  Adjust resources prices accordingly.

name: Space Hotel
body: +1C/turn, +1 Food Price

name: Space Farm
body: +1F/turn, -1 Food Price, requires launch

name: Embargo
body: Target player may not trade with the market next turn. +1 Price to resources that player produces, -1 otherwise

name: Space Fighter
body: Steal 1C from target weaker player, +1 to Navy Size, requires launch

name: Asteroid Miner
body: Draw an asteroid and harvest up to one.  Shuffle unused asteroid back into deck.  Requires launch

name: Solar Flare
body: Random other player loses 2 target resources.

name: Bulk Shipment
body: Sell up to 4 of any one resource.  If you sell 4, decrease the price by 1.  If bought increase it.

name: Market Disruption
body: Increase the price of one resource by two.

name: Offworld Blight
body: +2 Food price.  All players discard 1f.

name: Industrial Sabotage
body: Return target launch system to its owner's hand.  Owner gets +1M and loses a VP.

name: Carrier
body: Spend 2 Fu to return an action to target weaker owner's hand. Requires launch. +3 Navy

name: Meteor Strike
body: Disable target colony.  Its production stops until owner spends 1M and 1C.  +1 Price to that colony's resource.

name: Daedelus Probe
body: After 3 turns of travel, reveal a new star system.

name: Melt Probe
body: Explore frozen ocean for life.  Requires launch.

name: Mutiny
body: Disable target colony.  Its production stops until owner spends 1M and 1C.  +1 Price to that colony's resource.

name: Icarus Probe
body: After 3 turns of travel, reveal a new star system.

name: Critical Equipment Failure
body: Disable target colony.  Its production stops until owner spends 1C+1C/Orbit from homeworld.

name: Fuel Spill
body: Target water colony owner loses 1Fu, 1W, +1W price

name: Stampede
body: Target player colonizing a world with megafauna must spend an extra 2 turns to colonize the world.

name: Asteroid Hunter
body: Draw an extra asteroid when mining.  Draw 1 Action card when launched.  Requires launch.

name: Mass Driver
body: Ignore escape velocity of exactly 1.  +1C/launch by any player.  +1 Buy/Sell Transaction per turn. +1 VP

name: Solar Array
body: Once per turn receive 1C OR Trade 1W for 1Fu.  Requires launch.  -1Fu Price, +1W price.

name: Tether Catapult
body: Ignore escape velocity of exactly 1.  +1C/launch by any player.  +1 Buy/Sell Transaction per turn. +1 VP, Requires Vacuum Atmosphere

name: Launch Loop
body: Ignore escape velocity of 2 or less. 1C/launch by any player. +1 Transaction per turn. +1 VP

name: Space Elevator
body: Ignore escape velocity of 3 or less. 1C/launch by any player. +1 Transaction per turn. +1 VP

name: Garden Terrarium
body: +1Fo, Trade food at 2:1, Trade any resource at 3:1, Decrease Food price.  Requires discarded silicate asteroid to be placed underneath this card when built.

name: Space Carnery
body: Pay 1C for +2 Food once per turn.  Decrease food price when launched.  Requires launch.

name: Space Arena
body: +2C/turn, +1 Fuel price, requires launch.

name: Cruiser
body: +2 Navy size.  -1C Steal a resource from any weaker player.  Requires launch.

name: Drone Swarm
body: +1 Navy size.  Target weaker player discards an action.  Requires launch.

name: Refinery
body: +2 Fuel/turn.  Requires colony on a hydrocarbon world.  -1Fu price.

name: Space Fountain
body: Ignore escape velocity of 2 or less. 1C/launch by any player. +1 Transaction per turn. +1 VP

name: Fighter Drone
body: +1 Navy size.  Target weaker player loses 1C.  Requires launch.

name: Space Lab
body: Draw an extra card each turn.  Place one of those cards on the bottom of the deck.

name: Planet Hunter
body: Look at planets of any system and put them back face down.  When built, draw 2 actions, keep one, and put the other on the bottom of the deck.  Requires launch.

name: Longshot Probe
body: After 4 turns of travel, reveal a new star system.

name: Earth Tax
body: All players discard down to 5 resources.  Shuffle earth tax and discarded actions into the action deck.
